sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' class ItemDetail extends React.Component { render() { const {details} = this.props let creditUrl if (details['image credit']) { creditUrl = 'https://www.instagram.com/' + details['image credit'].substr(1) + '/' } let backgroundImage if (details.Tags !== 'LIST' && details.Image[0].url) { backgroundImage = { backgroundImage: 'url(' + details['Image'][0].url + ')', backgroundSize: 'cover', backgroundPosition: 'center', backgroundRepeat: 'no-repeat' } } return (
{/* No image credit? Don't show this section */} { !!details['image credit'] ?
photo by {details['image credit']}
: null }
{details['Item Name']}
{details['Item Description']}
{details['Price']}
{ !!details.Tags ? details.Tags.join(', ') : null }
) } } export default ItemDetail
